description:
With a design that is conducive to small spaces and technology that provides a large, clear picture quality, the Samsung 32-inch TV is designed to be used in a variety of rooms while providing high-level image clarity. The Samsung UN32EH5000F is a screen designed with dimensions of 29.1 inches wide, 17.5 inches tall, and just 3.7 inches deep. This LCD TV weighs just 13 lbs and can be easily set up in almost any room. As a screen that is ENERGY STAR efficient and consumers only 0.3 watts on standby and 33 watts in normal operation, the Samsung 32-inch TV is slim not only in physical dimensions, but power consumption as well. The Samsung UN32EH5000F is designed to provide a native resolution of 1920x1080 with a dynamic contrast ratio of 3500000:1 and a clear motion rate of 120. This LCD TV offers a variety of features such as wide color enhancement, ConnectShare, game mode, and even an eco sensor. The Samsung 32-inch TV is a nice screen option for home use.
